attributes.additional_details: The Government in collusion with Ofcom have decided that the news broadcasts by Press TV, are not to their liking and not in their interest, so have decided that no one must be allowed to hear the other side of the story, and only hear the story fed to us by their stooges, SKY, BBC, CNN and Al-Jazeera. This is government sponsored censorship of free press, and a precursor in preparation of an onslaught, on Syria and Iran, in the form of UN resolutions and Wars.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Ofcom.
